languages.text: "Не на службе. И не в отсеках, забитых арестованной чернью". {n}Голос Хротко полон ледяного спокойствия.{/n}
"Not on duty. And certainly not in compartments full of detained rabble." {n}Hrotko's voice is icily calm.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не на службе. И не в отсеках, забитых арестованной чернью". {n}Голос Хротко полон ледяного спокойствия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Not on duty. And certainly not in compartments full of arrested rabble." {n}Hrotko's voice is full of icy calm.{/n}
"Not on duty. And certainly not in compartments full of arrested rabble." {n}Hrotko's voice is full of icy calm.{/n}
"Not on duty. And certainly not in compartments full of detained rabble." {n}Hrotko's voice is full of icy calm.{/n}

"Not on duty. And certainly not in compartments full of detained rabble." {n}Hrotko's voice is icily calm.{/n}
"Not on duty. And certainly not in compartments full of detained rabble." {n}Hrotko's voice is icily calm.{/n}
"Not on duty. And certainly not in compartments full of detained rabble." {n}Hrotko's voice is icily calm.{/n}

languages.text: "Nicht im Dienst. Und sicher nicht in Modulen, in denen es von Abschaum wimmelt." {n}Hrotkos Stimme ist eiskalt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not on duty. And certainly not in compartments full of detained rabble." {n}Hrotko's voice is icily calm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nicht im Dienst. Und sicher nicht in Modulen, in denen es von Abschaum wimmelt." {n}Hrotkos Stimme ist eiskalt.{/n}

languages.text: « Pas en service. Et encore moins dans des compartiments où est détenue la populace. » {n}La voix de Hrotko, glaciale, transpire le calme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not on duty. And certainly not in compartments full of detained rabble." {n}Hrotko's voice is icily calm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pas en service. Et encore moins dans des compartiments où est détenue la populace. » {n}La voix de Hrotko, glaciale, transpire le calme.{/n}

languages.text: «Cuando estoy de servicio, no. Y menos en compartimentos llenos de escoria arrestada». {n}La voz de Hrotko suena fría y muy tranquila.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not on duty. And certainly not in compartments full of detained rabble." {n}Hrotko's voice is icily calm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cuando estoy de servicio, no. Y menos en compartimentos llenos de escoria arrestada». {n}La voz de Hrotko suena fría y muy tranquila.{/n}

languages.text: 「勤務中じゃありません。それに、拘留された暴徒だらけの区画になどいるものですか」{n}フロトコの声は氷のように冷ややかだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not on duty. And certainly not in compartments full of detained rabble." {n}Hrotko's voice is icily calm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「勤務中じゃありません。それに、拘留された暴徒だらけの区画になどいるものですか」{n}フロトコの声は氷のように冷ややかだ。{/n}

languages.text: “我值班的时候是不会戴的，在满是犯人的船舱里自然也是不会戴的。”{n}赫洛卡的声音冰冷而平静。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not on duty. And certainly not in compartments full of detained rabble." {n}Hrotko's voice is icily calm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我值班的时候是不会戴的，在满是犯人的船舱里自然也是不会戴的。”{n}赫洛卡的声音冰冷而平静。{/n}

languages.text: "Vazife başında takmıyorum. Hele ki tutuklu ayaktakımıyla dolu kompartımanlarda asla takmam." {n}Hrotko'nun sesinde ilgisiz bir sakinlik var.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not on duty. And certainly not in compartments full of detained rabble." {n}Hrotko's voice is icily calm.{/n}
